title: Returning to rumors and future expectations
subtitle: On the Day of "Return to the Future," many rumors about BTTF's vision of life in 2015 were prominent in social media.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: ∙ Several social media rumours were published on the Day of Return (21 October 2015): Michael J. Fox was arrested for "intruding sports betting," that Naiki handed over a pair of self-performing sports shoes, and that Bev Tannen's character was based on Donald Trump.
